descriptionHtml:
Attack Pattern Information

ItemValue
Pattern IDXSS_DOM_014
NameDOM outerHTML injection
CategoryXSS
Subcategorydom
SeverityHIGH

Attack Details

  • Payload: element.outerHTML='<img src=x onerror=alert(1)>'
  • Encoded: element.outerHTML%3D'%3Cimg%20src%3Dx%20onerror%3Dalert(1)%3E'
  • Expected Detection: Yes

Test Execution Results

  • Status: PASSED
  • Detection Count: 1 / 1
  • Latency: ~29000ms
  • Timestamp: 03:14:19.000 UTC

Detection Evidence

Rule Name: [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_014-1767842059937-rxhxwo pattern_id=XSS_DOM_014 uri=/?q=element.outerHTML%3D'%3Cimg%20src%3Dx%20onerror%3Dalert(1)%3E' client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

Falco Log Entry:

03:14:19.000000000: Critical [NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_DOM_014-1767842059937-rxhxwo pattern_id=XSS_DOM_014 uri=/?q=element.outerHTML%3D'%3Cimg%20src%3Dx%20onerror%3Dalert(1)%3E' client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
